premise_source_doc_sentence: Aside from doubling the length of each episode , The New Scooby-Doo Movies differed from its predecessor in the addition of a rotating special guest star slot ; each episode featured real world celebrities or well known animated characters joining the Mystery , Inc. gang in solving mysteries .

claim: The plot of Scooby-Doo involves solving mysteries that at first appear to be supernatural or based in sci fi.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mystery Incorporated returns to the early days of Scooby and the gang , when they are still solving mysteries in their home town , though it makes multiple references to previous incarnations of the franchise .

claim: The plot of Scooby-Doo involves solving mysteries that at first appear to be supernatural or based in sci fi.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The group travel in a van named the Mystery Machine , solving mysteries involving several local legends ; in doing so , they discover that the perpetrator is almost invariably a disguised person who seeks to exploit the legend for personal gain .

claim: The plot of Scooby-Doo involves solving mysteries that at first appear to be supernatural or based in sci fi.
premise_source_doc_sentence: This Saturday-morning cartoon series featured four teenagers -- Fred Jones , Daphne Blake , Velma Dinkley , and Norville `` Shaggy '' Rogers -- and their talking brown Great Dane named Scooby-Doo , who solve mysteries involving supposedly supernatural creatures through a series of antics and missteps .
